message.body: Pretty good thanx! I have off work today so I'm running some errands. How was ur weekend?
Great! I went up to pittsburgh for my friend's 21st. I am abt to head home.
Nice....21st bday are the best... What did y'all do?

Well she and a bunch of ppl went to the taylor swift concert so i went out with some other friends until she got back at 12:30. We went to the only openbar in the neighborhood. It's a crappy bar, but we made the best of it.
(1/2) Cool...on my 21st ..my homegirl took me to a bar in the university of penn area.... I think we tossef back 20 margaritas between us....luckily her place w
But theyre amazing. And they dont have mad mex in my neck of the woods, so i indulged :)
Haha margs are the best. Right before that bar, i went to mad mex with my other friends and had 2 big ass margaritas. Theyre like 36 oz each haha.
Lmao it's all about mad mex! Where is ur neck of the woods?
Ohh okay...I lov DC way more than philly I like a place called 18th st lounge.. Dj spins: house,hip hop, funk with a touch of latin and caribean....
Idk if i've been there. But dupont circle def has some fun bars.
Yea...I need to hit dc again...my last 2 bdays I've been there...
